short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the Item Purchase History an item on eBay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An add-on/extension for Chrome and Firefox to see the actual eBay Actual Purchase History of an item on eBay. It will create a link for sold text to navigate Actual Purchase History.
